text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
January this year is especially cold...<n>Yet despite the
weather, I'm out on<n>the training track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All around me are young racers<n>preparing to start their shot
at the<n>Classics this spring.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Only a few select racers qualify for<n>the Classics! If you
want in, you gotta<n>show me you got what it takes!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Yes, sir!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Maaan, everyone sure is pumped up.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You can only attempt the Classic<n>Races once in your career.
If you<n>don't qualify, that's it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You can only attempt the Classic<n>Races once in your career.
If you<n>don't qualify, that's it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes, and that's why hundreds, if not<n>thousands of racers
each year dream<n>of winning the Classics.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And after aaall that training, some of<n>us still go and hog all
the glory, eh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Don't look at me like that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As if you can talk. You'd have plenty<n>of honors yourself if
you took your<n>races seriously.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, who says I'm not takin'<n>'em seriously?! Don't
you worry, I'm<n>planning on winning one or two of<n>those
classic races!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, hear that? That's the sound<n>of my adoring fans
awaiting my rise to<n>glory!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What are those cheers for? It sounds<n>like there's some
sort of commotion<n>going on.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: DON'T IGNORE ME!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: That's another personal record!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
I'd heard there was a promising<n>rookie among the racers
this year, but<n>she's way beyond what I expected.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
That's what I like to see from you,<n>Suzuka. That speed of
yours is<n>remarkable.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Once you've run your debut race,<n>we'll use that experience
to develop a<n>running style that makes use of your<n>unique
strengths.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay, sounds good.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All that hubbub for Suzuka, huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You know her?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You know her?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What, you don't? She and her crazy<n>legs have been all the
rage ever since<n>she entered the academy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So her debut is finally approaching... I<n>can't wait to see what
she can do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't hear the name Silence Suzuka<n>again until several
weeks later at the<n>Kyoto Racecourse.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
The press really came out in droves<n>for this race. Are you
also here for<n>Silence Suzuka's debut?

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text:
You bet! I can't wait to see her<n>running. I even brought four<n>
cameramen to fully capture it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Sounds like today is Silence Suzuka's<n>debut race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as I begin to wonder myself<n>what sort of run could
inspire so many<n>rumors, I hear footsteps approach me<n>
from behind.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You there. Aren't you Team Sirius's<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I am Air Groove, vice president of the<n>student council. But
I'm sure you've<n>heard of me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Like any other school, Tracen<n>Academy has its own student
council,<n>which offers support to the school in<n>ways only
students can.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps surprisingly, Narita Brian is<n>also an officer in the
student council, a<n>subject her teammates love to tease<n>
her about.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I don't believe any members of Team<n>Sirius are
participating in this race...<n>Could it be you're here for
Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Kind of. I was in the area and figured<n>I'd check out some
races. I didn't<n>realize Suzuka would be here, though.<n>Did
you come for her debut?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Kind of. I was in the area and figured<n>I'd check out some
races. I didn't<n>realize Suzuka would be here, though.<n>Did
you come for her debut?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka and I have known each other<n>for quite some time.
What's more, the<n>student council has got their eye on<n>her.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oh, really?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Indeed. It seems the president has<n>high hopes for her.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The president... You mean SymboliRudolf? Now I'm really excited tosee her in action.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The president... You mean SymboliRudolf? Now I'm really excited tosee her in action.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Little did I know just how thrilling her<n>race would be...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka begins rounding the<n>final corner, still in the
lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And look how far she's pulled ahead!<n>But she's still going
faster as she<n>enters the homestretch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Two hundred meters left! Silence<n>Suzuka speeds up even
more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite staying in the lead for the<n>entire race, Silence
Suzuka shows no<n>signs of fatigue. Instead, she leaves<n>the
pack farther and farther behind...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This speed! She's ahead by five<n>lengths—no, six! Just how
fast can she<n>go?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka crosses the finish line!<n>Her debut race ends
in a flawless<n>victory!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's fast. Surprisingly fast. But<n>more than that...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yes! Attagirl, Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah... Ahem. So, what did youthink of Suzuka? Fast, isn't she?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah! So fast! But more than that...
choice_data_list: She looks like she's having so much fun!
She looks like she's having so much fun!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah! So fast! But more than that...
choice_data_list: She looks like she's having so much fun!
She looks like she's having so much fun!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ...Fun?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, well... Is that how you see it?<n>What an interesting
perspective.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe...
